This was quite an experience. Over 500 pages is exceptionally long for a fuck story. It, however, somehow works quite well. The rape part definitely was unnecessary, it ruins the mood set by the previous chapters. This was the only part that made me stay completely soft. Despite how dumb the plot is in general (that isn’t bad, it’s just hilariously fucking stupid), "this" chapter just feels like it doesn’t belong here. Rape’s there for the sake of rape. It’s kind of needed as a plot device, but the author just goes way too far with it, whatever. Overall, this artist knows his ways: the artstyle looks unique and, in its own way, extremely appealing. There’s something about it, the way he draws faces and bodies. It all feels very cartoony yet sexy as fuck. All the "bossfight" girls are great. Tens of other less important ones also keep the quality bar. 8/10. Sorry if there are mistakes, not my first language. I just feel obligated to write something about this.
I feel like I lost Brain cells reading this ....it was hot but still..
